connectionProperties.dataSource.label: Data Source
connectionProperties.dataSource.descript: Oracle Net Services Name, Connect Descriptor, or an Easy Connect naming that identifies the database to which to connect
connectionProperties.userName.descriptio: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting to the data source
connectionProperties.password.descriptio: Indicates the password to be used when connecting to the data source
connectionProperties.dbaPrivilege.label: Administrative privileges
connectionProperties.metadataPooling.des: This attribute indicates whether the metadata information for executed queries is cached for improved performance.
connectionProperties.proxyUserId.label: Proxy User Id
connectionProperties.proxyUserId.descrip: User name of the proxy user.
connectionProperties.authType.descriptio: Specifies the method of authenticating with Azure Monitor
connectionProperties.authType.categoryVa: Azure Active Directory - Universal with MFA support
